others: JHJJ 是记录筹码分布的数据库，每个股票每日一个记录
direction   3 表示买方，1 表示卖方
sqls:
CREATE TABLE jhjj (
  "id" char(30) NOT NULL,
  "symbol" char(20) NOT NULL,
  "time" bigint NOT NULL,
  "direction" TINYINT NOT NULL,
  "price" INTEGER NOT NULL,
  "volume" INTEGER NOT NULL,
  "bidask" INTEGER NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY ("id")
);

apis.name: getTables
apis.sql: select name from sqlite_master where type="table" order by name;

apis.name: queryJHJJ
apis.desc: -apis 获取所有 krecord 数据

apis.name: queryJHJJRangeTime
apis.sql: select id,symbol,time,direction,price,volume,bidask from JHJJ where symbol='{symbol}' and time>={fromTime} and time<={endTime} ORDER BY time;
apis.desc: -apis 获取所有 krecord 数据
